item.title: Teck Announces Sale of Wintering Hills Wind Power Facility
item.description: [Marketwired] - Teck Resources Limited announced today that it has entered into an agreement to sell its 49 per cent interest in the Wintering Hills wind power facility to IKEA Canada for CAD $58.6 million. The joint ...
